LanguageData.EggWoWRaptorFertilized.label: raptor egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggWoWRaptorFertilized.description: A fertilized chicken egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a raptor juvenile. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggWoWHawkstriderFertilized.label: hawkstrider egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggWoWHawkstriderFertilized.description: A fertilized hawkstrider egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a hawkstrider chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggWoWKodoFertilized.label: kodo egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggWoWKodoFertilized.description: A fertilized kodo egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a kodo calf. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggWoWVoidstriderFertilized.label: hawkstrider egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggWoWVoidstriderFertilized.description: A fertilized voidstrider egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a voidstrider chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggWoWDragonhawkFertilized.label: dragonhawk egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggWoWDragonhawkFertilized.description: A fertilized voidstrider egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a dragonhawk chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggWoWMurlocFertilized.label: dmurloc egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggWoWMurlocFertilized.description: A fertilized murloc egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a murloc tadpole. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggWoWFairyDragonFertilized.label: fairy dragon egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggWoWFairyDragonFertilized.description: A fertilized fairy dragon egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a fairy dragon chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
